title: Negronis Recipe (for a Crowd)
full_text:
Negronis Recipe (for a Crowd)
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
8
ounces
dry
gin
5 1/2
ounces
sweet vermouth
(I like Carpano Antica, but that's hard to find in many places)
5 1/2
ounces
Campari
6
ounces
bottled water
(something neutral, not mineral water)
Directions
Using a funnel, pour all ingredients into a bottle. Close the bottle and chill until service.
Special equipment
25-oz. bottle, funnel, measuring cups
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
